Sightseeing in Cimiez Area of Nice, 27 April 2003

---We were thinking we should have bought one and split it.---
---Children were all over as it was a Sunday afternoon.---
---Soccer (or fotbal as they say) was the favorite sport.

---Peach tree in bloom-shades of Van Gogh's Peach Tree against an aqua sky.---
---Everyone enjoying the sun and warmth.---
---Then we visited the Matisse Museum after lunch. The building is a renovated 17th century Genoan-style villa.---

---It is right next to the ruins and houses Matisse's personal collection from his time in Nice from 1917 until his death in 1954,---
---The cornices are painted on the facade; they are not stone as they appear.---
---Interesting seat used by Matisse. The object in front is a Brasero.--
